name: Strawberry Margarita
description: An unusual combination with a unmistakable flavor. Mixes the freshness blend of lemon with a sweetness of strawbery. Ideal drink for hot days!
directions: On cocktail shaker,  add salt and lemon juice and shake.
Add golden tequila and strawberry liqueur, mix well.
Put the mixture in a Margarita Glass, you can put fresh strawberry to adorn.
